name: Stomach out of Control
description:
It might take 10 - 20 seconds to load. Don't leaf this page!

Reach the Toilet before your Stomach explodes!

This is my game entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. You need to parkour through the levels and make it in time. If you fail, you'll explode. Good luck!

Movement

 Move left and right:      A and D

Jump / Double Jump:      Space
